questions.question_text: An administrator needs to see the type of CPU that a server is running. Which of the following files contains this information?

A junior systems administrator is creating a cron job. The cron job requirements are as follows:
✑ Run the hello.sh script every hour (24 times in one day).
✑ Run it on Monday only.
Given this scenario, which of the following crontab options should be configured to meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Just as it hits 0 minutes in the day, cron job runs the task. For example, 00:00, 01:00, 02:00 and so on. If it hits 0 minute 24 times, that takes care of every hour in the day. (If not every hour then it would have been *) 
The 1 in 5th position represent Monday. You can use 1 or mon but not Monday. 
Therefore, the correct answer is A

The option A can be verified in https://crontab.guru/
an here is the solution from this website:
https://ibb.co/7z92gZv

can someone explain why it is A ?, none of them seem to be right:
field allowed values
minute
0-59
hour
0-23
day of month
1-31
month
1-12 (or names, see below)
day of week
0-7 (0 or 7 is Sun, or use names)

comments.content:
Each hour starts with a 0, therefore every hour the condition of 0 minutes and 1 (Monday) will be met and the job will run.
Example: 00:00, 01:00, 02:00 -- -- -- 13:00, 14:00
Just note the minutes equal zero on every hour.

questions.question_text: A systems administrator needs to append output of ls `"lha /opt command to the contents of a test.txt file. Which of the following commands will accomplish this?
A Linux systems administrator is setting up SSH access with PKI for several using their newly created RSA keys. Which of the following MOST securely achieves this task?

choices.C: Use ssh-copy-id to copy each user's public key file to the respective system
choices.A: Use curl to copy each user's public key file to the respective system
choices.B: Use cp to copy each user's public key file to the respective system
choices.D: Use ssh-copy-id to copy each user's private key file to the respective system

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
"C" is the valid answer

choices.C: To ensure software builds in test are not accidentally deployed to production
choices.D: To streamline the deployment process for deploying builds into test environments
choices.B: To enable notifications when builds are deployed to the test environment
choices.A: To ensure the build commits are also deployed to the test environment

questions.question_text: The development team has automated their software build process so each time a change is submitted to the source code repository, a new software build is compiled. They are requesting that the Linux operations team look into automating the deployment of the software build into the test environment. Which of the following is the benefit to the development team for implementing deployment automation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D: seems valid anwer because the question said "...automating the deployment of the software build...", so we streamline the deployment -process for deplying builds- into test environments
